Maps

This page would contain various visualizations that communicate geospatial data in a user-interactive environment Here is the dashboard created on ArcGIS Online to show positive cases per MODZCTA in NYC.

Using the above dashboard, we can identify some of the most affected neighborhoods in NYC:

Neighborhood Borough People Positive People Tested
Bloomfield/Freshkills Park Staten Island 199 3,451
Midwood Brooklyn 165 2,926
Gravesend/Homecrest Brooklyn 163 2,012
